wikipedia_page.main: Stuart Reardon is an English fitness model and former professional rugby league footballer who most recently played for the North Wales Crusaders. He played as a fullback, wing, or centre.

response: |4||Greg Inglis (Aus), Stuart Reardon (GB), Paul Johnson (GB), Isoia Soliola (NZ),  Brent Tate (Aus),

In 2008 Pryce was charged and appeared in court alongside Stuart Reardon on charges of assault and violence following an alleged incident at Reardon's estranged wife's house in Queensbury, Bradford. They were charged with using violence to gain entry and common assault. The charge of using violence to gain entry against both defendants was dropped after the prosecution offered no evidence. In March 2009, having been found guilty of common assault, the pair were given a 12-week suspended sentence.

* Stuart Reardon won caps for England while at Bradford Bulls in 2005 against France, New Zealand (sub), and won caps for Great Britain while at Bradford Bulls in 2004 against Australia (3 matches), New Zealand (2 matches)
